Text: Hey I'm running an investigation into cult activity on this island. You don't happen to know anything about that, do you?
Nawwww bruv I don't know nothin' about any cult activity, that's peak mate.
I'm actually just enjoying my mornin' cig! I always crave a cheeky bit of nicotine in the morning...
Yeeeeaaahhh it just kicked in mate......
Awwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww blimey mate I do love me a bit of nicotine...........
NOTE: AT SOME POINT HAVE HIM MENTION THE CASHIER IS 'BARLEY IN MOST THE TIME' TO FORESHADOW SHIT
